product_name: TYR Special Ops 2.0 Polarized Swim Goggles
long_description: Ideal for open-water swimmers and triathletes, the TYR Special Ops 2.0 Polarized Swim Goggles offer a comfortable, secure fit. Polarized lenses block horizontal sun rays that bounce off the top of water; antifog, tinted and mirrored lenses are great on sunny days. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact-resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Unibody frame and simple nosebridge system accommodate a wide variety of facial types and offer a wide, peripheral view. Silicone gaskets seal out water for a comfortable fit that maintains its original shape, swim after swim. The TYR Special Ops 2.0 Polarized Swim Goggles feature an easy-to-adjust silicone strap that conforms to the sides of your head; flat back straps help create a secure fit.
short_description: Ideal for open-water swimmers and triathletes, the TYR Special Ops 2.0 Polarized Swim Goggles offer a comfortable, secure fit.
